document.full_text: in a game crowded with seven current all-stars, dwyane wade stood out with 38 points and 5 assists in the heat's victory in the opener of the eastern conference semifinal series.
document.title: playoffs | heat 99, celtics 90: wade shines brightest as heat holds off celtics
lines_and_colors: in a game crowded with seven current all-stars, dwyane wade stood out with 38 points and 5 assists in the heat's victory in the opener of the eastern conference semifinal series.
